template_questions.question: What {variants} influence the expression of {gene identifier} as {eQTLs}?
template_questions.cypher_query: MATCH (v:sequence_variant)-[r:eQTL_of]->(g:gene) WHERE v.id = $input RETURN v, g, r

template_questions.question: Which {genes} have {variant identifier} as their {eQTLs}?
template_questions.cypher_query: MATCH (g:gene)-[r:eQTL_of]->(v:sequence_variant) WHERE g.name = $input RETURN g, r, v
